page.title: 08LEISURE AND RECREATION
page.content: {Leisure and Recreation { In my spare time I play on my computer.I have got over 70 games. I have also got a lightpen, means I can draw anything I want on the television.I also build cars with my technical lego.I sometimes watch television but I normally put a video on.I have got 5 videos Live and Let Die, Rocky III,'OMEN III,'STARS WARS and Halk the Slager'. Sometimes I go down to the local running track.I Can run 200 metres in 20.46 seconds.I also go for bike rides and swim in my spare time.
